abstract: 22 anti-valentine 's day cards for your favorite pain in the butt .
article: there are two kinds of couples : those who think the ideal valentine 's day includes roses , a bubble bath and a fancy dinner , and those who would much rather spend it on the couch eating snacks and binge-watching a new show . if you and your significant other fall into the latter camp , then you 've come to the right place . below , we 've compiled 22 anti-valentine 's day cards for couples who are more snarky than sappy . 1 . buy it from knottycards on etsy for $ 4.50 . 2 . buy it from ticktockpress on etsy for $ 4.50 .
